articles.title: Reception Given by C.C., WPK and DPRK NDC
articles.content:
Reception Given by C.C., WPK and DPRK NDC
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A splendid reception was given by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) at the Mokran House Friday evening on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and premier, Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA), Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C. C., the WPK, Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Yong Mu, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, O Kuk Ryol, member of the C.C., WPK and vice-cha
					
					 irman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun and Choe Ryong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Rak Hui, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and depar
					
					 tment director of the C.C., the WPK, U Tong Chuk and Kim Chang Sop, alternate members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, and staff members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, members of the C.C., the WPK, members of the Party Central Military Commission, leading officials of the NDC and armed forces organs, officials of ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and others.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho made a speech there.
					
					 He said it was the greatest honor of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the great fortune of Kim Il Sung's nation that they have lived and made revolution, holding Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of their destiny and their father.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will always remember Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who performed the undying feats on behalf of the times and history as a human being, revolutionary and the people's father, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The history of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership is given steady continuity thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The world will clearly see what historic miracles Songun Korea will perform under the leadership of Kim Jong Un after letting Kim Jong Il lie in state. 
					
					 At the reception a performance was given by artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Women's International Democratic Federation and its President Marcia de Campos Pereira sent floral baskets to statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio to mark the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The baskets were placed before the statues on Saturday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Businessman
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Businessman
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the board director of a foodstuff company in Tangshan City of Hebei Province, China.
					 Board Director He Jianhui handed the gift over to Pak Myong Ho, charge d'affaires of the DPRK embassy in China on Tuesday.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Russia and Kuwait
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Russia and Kuwait 
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company presented a gift to general secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday. 
					 Its Director Elena Scherbakova Tuesday conveyed the gift to Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia. 
					
					 Gifts to Kim Jong Il also came from Kuwaiti companies and businessmen. They included the Al Bayan National Trading Company, the general manager of building materials and contracting company and the general manager of Arab contracting company. The gifts were handed to DPRK officials operational in Kuwait.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Grumble of Those Driven into Corner
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Grumble of Those Driven into Corner
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- As already reported, servicepersons of the three services of the Korean People's Army met at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche, on Feb. 16 to make public a joint decision on renaming the palace the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, pay respects to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and pledge loyalty to KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					 The news about this event evoked a big response from among all Koreans and the world people as it fully displayed the noble spiritual world and steadfast will of the army and the people of the DPRK to hold in high esteem for all ages the peerlessly great men produced by the nation and remain intensely loyal to them and the might of their unbreakable unity.
					
					 "The DPRK is still advancing along the line of Kim Jong Il." "The leadership system of Kim Jong Un has been perfectly established." "The conjecture about the DPRK seems to be a fiction." "The world community may have a poor understanding of the DPRK."
					
					 This is what some media, which defiled the Korean people's bitter sorrow and engaged themselves in misinformation, have reported after witnessing the recent events in the DPRK.
					
					 But, the south Korean group of traitors viciously slandered them through YTN and other some reptile media.
					
					 Its sinister smear propaganda goes to clearly prove that the group is now at loss, frightened by the might of the single-minded unity of the army and the people of the DPRK rallied close around the great Party and the dynamic general advance of the Songun revolution.
					
					 This is nothing but a last-ditch effort of the group to prevent the spread of the world-startling reality of the DPRK to the south Korean people and mislead public opinion.
					
					 It is very pitiful of reptile media to parrot such plotters' grumbles for no ground by clinging to the coattail of the present "government" on downfall.
					
					 YTN of Yonhap News can never understand the world of noble loyalty of the people in the DPRK as it is keen only on confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Now in south Korea people are waging almost every day the struggle to boycott hearing or view disgusting smear reports or publications by reptile media and producing broadcasting programs.
					
					 The Yonhap News branch of the press trade union of south Korea issued a statement and turned out in the struggle to drive the incumbent chief and the management board out of the news service on Feb. 13, saying that its confidence level went down to zero as it has been  absorbed for the last three years in distorted information.
					
					 Such waiting maids of power as YTN together with the group of traitors on the point of ruin, will face a stern punishment by history.

articles.title: Vice-President of Cuban Council of State on Development of Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Vice-President of Cuban Council of State on Development of Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Gladis Maria Bejerano Portela, vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba accepted credentials from Jon Yong Jin, DPRK ambassador to his country, on Feb. 13.
					 He said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the Cuban party, government and people, express once again deep condolences over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il to our regret.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a close friend of the Cuban people. He always paid deep attention to the steady development of the fraternal relations between Cuba and the DPRK.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will register greater successes in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Cuban government will in the future, too, develop the friendly and cooperative relations in an overall way in all fields, cherishing deep the comradely obligation with the DPRK as intended by the supreme leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK Title of Labor Hero Awarded to Artist
articles.content:
DPRK Title of Labor Hero Awarded to Artist
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Song Il was awarded the title of DPRK Labor Hero together with Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag (First Class). Ri is an artist of the mural and jewel painting group at the Art Studio of the Korean People's Army.
					 He made a distinguished contribution to production of fine art works portraying the leader. He successfully created the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il as a national treasure in a short span of time by giving full play to his talents and enthusiasm with firm faith that the leader is always with the Korean people.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on conferring the title was issued on February 4.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Shows Held in Different Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Shows Held in Different Parts of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Many working people of different strata and school youth and children of the DPRK have visited Kimjongilia shows and Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in across the country every day on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The show halls and greenhouses are decorated with immortal flowers in various forms.
					
					 The show halls in South Hamgyong, North Hwanghae and North Phyongan provinces have been crowded with visitors every day. 
					
					 Nearly 30 000 people visited the show hall in North Hamgyong Province on Feb. 15 and 16.
					
					 The show halls in Jagang and Kangwon provinces have been visited by a large number of working people and school youth and children carrying their ardent reverence for the peerless great man every day.
					
					 Also an endless stream of visitors flew to the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in cities and counties including Kaesong and Kusong cities and Tongrim and Anbyon counties.

articles.title: Foreigners Leave Here
articles.content:
Foreigners Leave Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Foreigners left here Saturday after participating in commemorations of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 They were Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, the delegation of the Japan Society for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works led by Masaji Ie, advisor of its National Liaison Council. 
					
					 Figure skaters from Russia, China, Bulgaria, France and Finland who took part in the 21st Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival also left on the same day.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in China
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show was held in Dalian City, Liaoning Province of China, on Feb. 14 to commemorate the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in its venue were more than 400 potted Kimjongilias carrying the boundless reverence of the Chinese people for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the show were officials of companies and citizens in Dalian and the DPRK consul-general and consuls in Shenyang and a delegation of the DPRK Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea to Stage Military Exercises for Preemptive Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea to Stage Military Exercises against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean naval forces have planned to stage joint military exercises in waters of the West Sea of Korea off Kunsan, North Jolla Province from Feb. 20 to 24, according to south Korea's Yonhap News. 
					 Involved in the exercises will be huge armed forces including Aegis destroyer and tens of warships and helicopters.
					
					 They announced that in the exercises they would put emphasis on strengthening the combined preparedness and raising the "capability of tactical operation against the north's submarine".
					
					 The exercises, aimed to make preemptive attack on the DPRK from the sea, are to be conducted under an agreement reached at the second meeting of the south Korean and U.S. navies in last December, which decided to stage combined anti-submarine exercises twice every year on a regular basis.
					
					 The reckless exercises against the DPRK go to clearly prove the deception of "dialogue" touted by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: S. Korea's Claim of Dialogue Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
S. Korea's Claim of Dialogue Termed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Saturday slams the south Korean authorities for their claim that they are open to dialogue. South Korea is refusing to answer the questions laid down by the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission in open questionnaires.
					 A by-lined commentary of the paper says:
					
					 South Korea is now holding the DPRK-targeted war exercises with outside forces despite its lip-service for dialogue.
					
					 This is aimed to convince the public that the DPRK is to blame for the stalled north-south ties and elicit support for winning in the "National Assembly" election.
					
					 Dialogue can not be made amid gun-report and will naturally end up in disputes.
					
					 South Korea hurt the people in the north when they were grieving over the greatest loss to the nation, far from paying respects during the mourning period. 
					
					 The commentary urges the Lee Myung Bak group not to talk about the north-south dialogue, bearing in mind the stand clarified by the army and the people of the DPRK that they will never deal with them.

articles.title: S. Korea's Talk about "Reunion of Separated Families" Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Talk about "Reunion of Separated Families" Ridiculed 
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities take every opportunity to claim they are open to "reunion of separated families" and "exchanges". They also call for carrying out the "May 24 measures". 
					 Describing it as an ostrich policy, Minju Joson Saturday observes in a bylined commentary:
					
					 The group of traitors has long lost the qualifications to claim the north-south reunion of separated families and relatives and exchanges and cooperation. 
					
					 Matter is why the group let loose such a sheer lie. 
					
					 It is aimed to evade the responsibility for the stalled north-south relations and escape from a tight corner by misleading domestic and international public opinion. 
					
					 Such a political swindle will get it nowhere.
					
					 If they honestly intend to hold reunion of separated families and relatives and exchanges and cooperation, they should answer the open questionnaires issued by the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 A political gimmick to mislead public opinion will only enrage the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korea's War Exercises against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's War Exercises against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in south Korea protested against the war exercises against the north planned by the U.S. and south Korea. They held the 149th action for independent reunification and peace in the Kwanghwamun area in Seoul on Feb. 14.
					 They denounced the present regime for planning to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills with the U.S. from Feb. 27 with more than 20 000 troops and huge war equipment involved.
					
					 The exercises will include the biggest landing drill.
					
					 Key Resolve is the biggest one aimed to occupy the northern part of Korea, they said, giving the lie to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' claim that the drills are aimed to "defend" south Korea.
					
					 The present regime is escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula by holding the war exercises and, at the same time, stepping up the clampdown on progressive forces which aspire after peace and reunification, they held.
					
					 They said they would try in solidarity with the patriotic people to have the dangerous exercises canceled.

articles.title: Punishment of S. Korean Group of Traitors Called for
articles.content:
S. Koreans Vow to Punish Group of Traitors 
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- More than 1,000 civic and public organizations of south Korea formed the "voters' network for the 2012 general election" and declared their actions to punish the group of traitors.
					 A press conference took place in Seoul on Feb. 9 to make public its inaugural declaration.
					
					 The declaration accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of pursuing unpopular policies which have resulted in deteriorated people's livelihood and escalated inter-Korean confrontation.
					
					 The 18th "National Assembly" is being called a faithful servant of the regime as it rammed unpopular budget and bills through NA, said the declaration.
					
					 The organizations vowed to open to public all the data related to those who took the lead or joined in enforcing policies for only privileged circle so as to defeat them in the forthcoming general election.
					
					 They made public the list of lawmakers who took the lead in railroading the unpopular budget bills during the 18th NA.

articles.title: Russia Intensifies Combating Terrorism
articles.content:
Russia Intensifies Combating Terrorism 
 Moscow, February 17 (KCNA) -- Russia has successfully combated terrorism in North Caucasus.
					 Some 58 terrorists were killed or arrested in several republics of the region this year.
					
					 This was announced by the commander-in-chief of the Interior Troops of the Russian Federation.

articles.title: Venezuela's Second Chinese-built Satellite to Be Launched
articles.content:
Venezuela's Second Chinese-built Satellite to Be Launched
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan president said a new Chinese-built satellite for Venezuela will be launched this year, a media report said.
					 The new satellite will be called "Miranda" and it will help monitor natural phenomena.
					
					 The Miranda satellite is expected to be sent into orbit between September and October.

articles.title: Cooperation among Developing Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Developing Countries
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Guatemala and El Salvador agreed on Monday to strengthen bilateral cooperation in combat against organized crimes such as drug smuggling and human traffic.
					 Earlier on Feb. 11 Pakistan and Sri Lanka signed three memorandums of understanding after bilateral talks to further promote cooperation in trade, technical education and other fields.

articles.title: Israel Arrests 14 Palestinians in West Bank, Gaza
articles.content:
Israel Arrests 14 Palestinians in West Bank, Gaza
						
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Israeli forces arrested 10 Palestinians in West Bank raids Monday and four fishermen off the Gaza coast, a media report said. 
					 The raids were intensive in the cities of Hebron and Tulkarem, where Israeli soldiers broke into Palestinian houses and arrested 10, residents said.

articles.title: UN Rapporteur Accuses Israel of Implementing "Judaization" Strategy
articles.content:
UN Rapporteur Accuses Israel of Implementing "Judaization" Strategy 
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The United Nations rapporteur on adequate housing accused Israel of implementing a strategy of what she termed "Judaization" and territorial control over Palestinians and minorities within Israel, the Jerusalem Post reported Monday.
					 "The Israeli authorities promote a territorial development model that excludes, discriminates against and displaces minorities, particularly affecting Palestinian communities," Rolnik said at a press conference.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Will Always Live in Hearts of Mankind: Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Will Always Live in Hearts of Mankind: Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Personages of Chile and Peru issued statements on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					On Feb. 16 the progressive mankind would greet the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people and leader of the world revolution who passed away so early to their deep regret, the first secretary of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) noted in a statement on Feb. 11, saying:
					
					The achievements in socialist construction of the DPRK and in the worldwide struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism would have been unthinkable without the idea, politics and leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The world progressive people will never forget the fact that he proved the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism in the days when socialism was abused by the imperialists due to the restoration of capitalism in the Soviet Union and East European countries and the reactionaries and their reptile mouthpieces were advertising about the "end of socialism".
					
					His 70th birth anniversary is a holiday of not only the Korean people but all of us and February 16 will be always kept as the red-letter day in the hearts of the world progressive people.
					
					The secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in a statement on Feb. 12 stressed that Kim Jong Il performed great feats by making untiring efforts for socialism of the DPRK and global independence with ardent patriotism and love for the people and the steadfast spirit of defending independence and peace.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Lectures were held in Mexico, Tajikistan and Democratic Congo, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Brazil, Guinea and India and a ceremony of opening the Taekwon-Do center and a commemoration of the Day of the DPRK in the Czech Republic between Feb. 7 and 11.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their undying feats and books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Korean films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Party Founding Memorial Tower".
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly elder statesman and outstanding Songun brilliant commander as he had long guided only to victory the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of the Songun revolution pioneered by the President.
					
					 His undying feats will shine forever in the history of Kim Il Sung's nation and the human history, the coordinator stressed.
					
					 Kurbonzyon Mirzoyeva, member of the Presidium of the C.C., Communist Party of Tajikistan, stated that Kim Jong Il was the benevolent father of the people as he gave top priority to the people's interests in working out every line and policy of the party and the state and devoted his all to the work for the people.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa in Democratic Congo said that the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il would be creditably carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK.
					
					 The international community is praising Kim Jong Il as a distinguished great man, said the rector of Indrafrasta State School of India.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Arranged in China
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Arranged in China
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A Korean film show took place in Beijing on Feb. 14 to commemorate the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Mustafa Al Safarini, chairman of the Arab Information Center in China, and his daughter Jindallae, the executive chairman of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China, the deputy general manager of the General Construction Company of China and other people.
					
					 Also present on invitation were the charge d'affaires and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 Speeches were made before the film show.
					
					 The chairman of the Arab Information Center in China said:
					
					 "Kim Jong Il was the benevolent father of the people who devoted his all to the building of a thriving nation and the people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Though he passed away, he will be always alive in our hearts for the great feats he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un."
					
					 The executive chairman of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China said that Kim Jong Il was the genuine leader of the people with literary and military accomplishments. He made signal contributions to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations, the chairman stressed.
					
					 Korean films shown included "Pyongyang at Night".

articles.title: Work Published in Syria
articles.content:
Work Published in Syria
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Dar Damascus Publishing House of Syria on Feb. 5.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Observed by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Nepal, Thailand and Iran carried special write-ups on Feb. 9 and 10 to commemorate the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Nepali paper Rahasha carried an article titled "Faith of Korean people" with a photo of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Il firmly defended socialism with his original Songun politics, put forward the Koreans as the people strong in independence, ushered in a great heyday for building a thriving nation and opened a bright prospect for national reunification.
					
					 Another Nepali paper Arpan praised the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il and introduced the Korean people pushing ahead with the building of a thriving country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Thai paper Xing San Daily carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and an article which said:
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is standing in the van of the Korean people who are now dynamically advancing to carry forward to completion the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his guidance the Korean people will surely accomplish the building of a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification and stand in the van of the progressive mankind aspiring after independence.
					
					 The Iranian paper Iran News devoted one whole page to an article on the greatness and personality of Kim Jong Il under the headline "On 70th birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great man", illustrated by a photo of the leader acknowledging the cheering crowd.
					
					 Besides, his birth anniversary was observed by International Relations, a magazine of Hong Kong, China, Guinean paper Horoya, Ugandan paper Sun Rise, Indian papers New Delhi Times, Science Technology and Education News and Tourism Era.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Orquesta Unhasu por 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Orquesta Unhasu por 16 de febrero
 Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, presencio el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu "Alma que sigue al sol" en homenaje al 70o aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il instituido como Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					 Kim Jong Un respondio a las aclamaciones de los espectadores.
					
					 Los espectadores guardaron un momento de silencio rindiendo los mas sentidos tributos a la memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 En el repertorio estuvieron el coro "Sonrisa de amor", las canciones clasicas interpretadas en serie "Regazo de la Patria", "Mi madre", "Azalea", "Acogida del sol en la ribera del Taedong", "Corea, te hare grande", el solo de trombon y coro "Pienso en el General", el sexteto femenino "Nuestro Padre", el solo y pangchang (coro del foso) femeninos, "Sere la flor que anuncia la primavera", el cuarteto mixto y pangchang "Me parecere al General", la narracion y musica orquestal "Lagrimas de Corea" y el coro "General es eterno como el sol", entre otras piezas.
					
					 En el concierto, los ejecutantes expresaron los testimonios de gran anoranza y veneracion de los militares y civiles coreanos al Dirigente quien sento la base eterna para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo sufriendo durante varios decenios las pruebas tan duras, nunca experimentadas por nadie de este mundo.
					
					 La narracion y varias canciones dieron a conocer la realidad enorgullecedora de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que como resultado de la abnegacion patriotica del Dirigente, se ha convertida en la gran potencia del Songun, el pais unido monoliticamente y el paraiso socialista.
					
					 Terminado el concierto, Kim Jong Un volvio a responder cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					 Evaluo altamente el exitoso concierto mostrandose muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido otra funcion magnifica con claros temas ideologicos que reflejo la gran aspiracion del pueblo coreano y su firme juramento y decision.
					
					 Este concierto ha sido el magnifico que podra alentar y animar al ejercito y pueblo coreanos que estan acelerando la marcha en gran auge revolucionario extranando mucho al Dirigente      Kim Jong Il, dijo.
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas de la Orquesta Unhasu seguiran estimulando a los militares y civiles produciendo un auge en la creacion artistica y las funciones.
					
					 Disfrutaron tambien el concierto Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, U Tong Chuk y otros funcionarios de los organos del partido, el Estado, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios, instituciones centrales, de los sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes capitalinos de diversos estratos.

articles.title: CC de PTC y CDN de RPDC Ofrecen banquete por Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
CC de PTC y CDN de RPDC Ofrecen banquete por Dia de Estrella Luz
 Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron esta noche en la Casa Mokran un solemne banquete en ocasion del Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC y primer ministro de Consejo de Ministros, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Yong Chun, miembro del BP del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del CDN y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Ri Yong Mu, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, O Kuk Ryol, miembro del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresiden
					
					 te del CDN, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun y Choe Ryong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Rak Hui, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimera ministra del Consejo de Ministros, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, U Tong Chuk y Kim Chang Sop, miembros suplentes del BP del CC del PTC y otros integrantes del BP del CC del PTC, miembros del CC y de la CMC del PTC, funcionarios directivos del CDN y los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de 
					
					 Corea, etc.
					
					 Hizo uso de la palabra Ri Yong Ho, quien destaco que han vivido y hecho la revolucion teniendo al gran Generalisimo Kim Jong Il como padre y Sol del destino, lo cual fue la primera gloria del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y la gran suerte de la nacion de Kim Il Sung.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos no olvidaran para siempre al Generalisimo quien acumulo inmarcesibles hazanas ante la epoca y la historia siendo gran hombre, revolucionario y padre del pueblo, destaco.
					
					 La historia de direccion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun se hereda invariablemente por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, apunto el orador y subrayo que el mundo conocera claramente cual milagro historico crea la Corea del Songun que conserva eternamente el cuerpo del gran Dirigente en el Palacio del Sol y goza de la guia del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Un.
					
					 En el banquete se ofrecio la funcion del Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan.

articles.title: Cuba dispuesta a desarrollar relaciones con Corea
articles.content:
Cuba dispuesta a desarrollar relaciones con Corea
 Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El nuevo embajador coreano en Cuba, Jon Yong Jin, presento el dia 13 sus cartas credenciales a la vicepresidenta del Consejo de Estado de Cuba, Gladis Maria Bejerano Portela.
					 En la ocasion, Gladis Maria volvio a expresar sentidas condolencias por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en nombre del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba.
					
					 Dijo que el Dirigente fue amigo intimo del pueblo cubano que presto siempre profunda atencion al desarrollo de las relaciones de hermandad entre Cuba y Corea.
					
					 Deseo que bajo la guia sabia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en la lucha por construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					 Finalizo que el gobierno cubano desarrollara generalmente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion en todas las ramas apreciando la camaraderia con Corea conforme al proposito de los maximos dirigentes de los dos paises.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela hipocresia de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela hipocresia de autoridades surcoreanas
 Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Cada vez que se les presenta la oportunidad, las autoridades surcoreanas abogan por el "encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur", el "intercambio y la cooperacion".
					 Paradojicamente, siguen hablando de mantener las "medidas del 24 de mayo" que impiden los contactos y el intercambio entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					 En un comentario individual publicado hoy al respecto, el periodico Minju Joson califico de hipocrita y fraudulenta esa conducta de autoridades surcoreanas, y prosiguio:
					
					 La camarilla de traidores surcoreanos perdio hace mucho tiempo la autoridad moral y el derecho para abordar susodichos temas.
					
					 Sin embargo, continua mintiendo que ellos desean el "encuentro de familiares y parientes separados" y el "intercambio y la cooperacion" con el Norte, para eludir la responsabilidad de la ruptura de relaciones intercoreanas y salir de la crisis enganando a la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					 Si ellos los desean de veras, deberian responder primero a la recien publicada acta de interpelacion abierta del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					 En el caso contrario, su estafa politica no tendra otro resultado que poner muy indignados a todos los coreanos.
